sentences: Saatis naabri k채itumise kohta kaebuse politseisse.
context: "Politseisse" is an Estonian directional case form that indicates movement toward or into a police-related location. It's formed from "politsei" (police) with the illative case ending "-sse", meaning someone going to, entering, or being taken to a police station or police custody. This word appears in context as part of a sentence about sending a complaint to the police authorities.
